channel.title: *NEW* Lost Dynasty Project - Old School
channel.description:
Well due to high volumes of people who want to see a server like this return, I jumped right on-board and decided to make the server! Now there are several things I want to keep when working on this server.
[ul][li]1. Keep object training with less XP however. (I am going to add a high score system)[/li] [li]2. Keep the client small, I want people to access it without having to download a 50mb client.[/li] [li]3. Prevent all possible dupes now, and prevent new ones to come.[/li] [li]4. Make it simple, yet hard to create some kind of challenge with the server.[/li][/ul]
Now, I understand servers like this need some kind of face lift so I will specify what I am doing to make this server have features from now a days, but keep the simplicity of the older days.
I will include NPC combat giving the same XP rate as the objects, however they will drop items you can sell for cash and other things.
I will include a PK Point system that can buy specific things (not anything great but something to make you coming back).
I will continue to update the server weekly to keep it alive.
I have already added an Anti-Mass system that will prevent lag server-wide because some idiot is spamming objects.
I've lowered the XP given so that I can add high-scores, because I have added some skills for skillers to train.
Current skills available: Smithing, Mining, Cooking, Fishing, and Woodcutting.
Anything else you want to see from the old server added to this server? Post here!
Media (Will update with more media as it comes available):
[img]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/350/homemc.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/9454/prayer.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/222/trainingarea.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img830.imageshack.us/img830/9260/ddspn.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/8274/cookingh.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img709.imageshack.us/img709/1588/fishingo.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img830.imageshack.us/img830/7954/giantsr.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/3281/woodcuttingz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img64.imageshack.us/img64/3010/theiving.jpg[/img]
THE SERVER IS NOW BEING HOSTED ON VPS, YOU CAN FIND LINK ON SERVER STATUS OR PM ME FOR LINK,
Will keep this updated will updates added to the server.

item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“mr dope, post:19, topic:395468”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=492655.msg3606221#msg3606221 date=1306131526]
Scully and I are making a server like this, too.

Good luck.
[/quote]

Isn’t scully doing a phonescape source right now and as for Zoft, looks nice and I’m glad you are bringing back the old[/quote]

Na, we’re actually doing a Hyperion, but making it like phonescape. Though without the annoying bugs.

Though lets not spam up this topic with that.

item.title: *NEW* Lost Dynasty Project - Old School
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

looks good im glad your trying keep it as old school as possible, i like that you used the old varrock bank as a home and used the old training methods. However i do suggest you add npc combat training if you dont have it already…

Great work, keep it up.

Ps. Pm me if you need any help ect. I’m always willing to lend a helping hand.

Read full topic

item.title: *NEW* Lost Dynasty Project - Old School
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Zoft™:

You’re such a hypocrite, ‘criticize for no reason’ what does [quote]So umm, what did you do other then add and remove some global objects?

And do you think something like Delta-Cleaned is going to attract attention? Unless you’re server has Korasi and all the other items you can forget about any downloads. Face it if you can take you’re project and shove it up you’re ass because releasing you’re source will just end up like rs2-dev. (Yeah you know how many people are using that as a base.) :rolleyes:[/quote]
Go look at the original project clean up kid, then come and complain at me. Also Korasi isn’t anything it takes 10 mins to add max.

Read full topic
